subject: College Athletics
Women and Girls
Triathlon
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. in January adopted women’s triathlon as an “emerging sport,” giving it a decade to attract at least 40 varsity teams, but so far, universities’ commitment has been lacking.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. in January adopted women’s triathlon as an “emerging sport,” giving it a decade to attract at least 40 varsity teams, but so far, universities’ commitment has been lacking.
